## Python setup

```{bash}
brew install python@3.12
brew install pipx
pipx ensurepath
pipx install poetry poethepoet pre-commit pytest ruff basedpyright
which poetry 
```

```{bash}
# Instal dependencies
poetry install
# Install pre-commit
pre-commit install
# Update pre-commit
pre-commit autoupdate
# Run pre-commit to test setup
pre-commit run --all-files
```
